thread.section_title: Defender Bird Spikes Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.birdspikesonline.co.uk
thread.title: Satisfied user
thread.title_full: Defender Bird Spikes reviewed by Satisfied user

author: Satisfied user
title: Satisfied user
text:
I bought a short section of stainless steel spikes to stop pigeons perching on the end of my roof, directly above my rear door. This was one of the few places where small sections could be bought. They were simple to fit with silicone and hardly visible from ground level, but have done their job admirably. I had a roofer working at the time and he fixed them in 5 minutes. The sections can also be snapped into shorter lengths, which was useful for fitting over the curved end-cap at the end of my roof.
I was totally delighted with both the product and the service, as well as the very reasonable price.
